nodes.text: Kyja Cho was a noble and art thief during the Galactic Civil War. The owner of a rare krayt dragon pearl, Cho held an auction on her sail barge, the Azure Sunset. In attendance were several Hutt crime lords and aristocrats and executives from the Corporate Sector Authority. One of the CSA executives was actually an Inquisitor sent secretly to the cruise on behalf of the Galactic Empire.
